data.text: @RinTinTinnyTop @Smilynntodd And those other vaccines went through many tests and were refined many times.

@RinTinTinnyTop @Smilynntodd Just because you took it doesn’t mean it was a good idea or that you won’t have side effects in the future. Have you seen the interview with the scientist that created it?

@realbeachbum5 @Smilynntodd The vaccine was meant for us all. I’m not at risk - have received both doses & the booster.

Vaccines help protect us. Across the states, required vaccines are given to children (polio, diphtheria, measles, rubella, tetanus, etc.) before they can begin attending public school.

@Smilynntodd You need to research and realize how detrimental it could be for anyone to take that vaccine. That vaccine was meant for those who were at high risk. Children are not high risk. Worry about yourself. Everyone should do what’s right for themselves. Vaccinating a child is wrong.
@Smilynntodd FL has a shade tree Surgeon General, fkn yes man for #DeathDeSantis #Florida
